Matthew

our story

We met in 2010 while organizing Betascape

- We were both really involved in the tech community; it was only a matter of time before we found each other.
- Matt did not wait long to make his move....
- As John Lennon said "Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans"

Our first date lasted 8 hours. Our second about the same.

- Heather
- Matt arrived to the second date 20 minutes early because 'he couldn't wait'

Our first trip together was Falling Waters.

- Matt had a terrible ear infection but refused to give up and drove the 5 hours there anyways.

???

I am a part of all that I have met; (Tennyson, Ulysses)

- We are so excited to bring the many important people in our lives, who have made us who we are, together in one place, for one weekend
